page.title: 09FREDDY MARTIN
page.content: 38 YEARS OLD FREDDY MARTIN LEFT SCHOOL AGED 15. THERE HAVE BEEN SEVERAL ALTERATIONS TO THE USE OF BUILDINGS IN TREGONY DUE TO THE TOURIST INDUSTRY.(EG THE CARAVAN). ALSO THE VILLAGE HAS INCREASED IN SIZE. THE PRICE OF SOME HOUSES HAS INCREASED TEN TIMES SINCE THEY WERE BUILT. FREDDY WORKS FOR E.C.L.P. HIS JOB HAS NOW RE MECHANIZED AND COMPUTERIZED. THIS IS ALSO THE CASE WITH FARMING. THE HOUSEWIFES JOB HAS GOT EASIER DUE TO ENERGY SAVING MACHINES. BATHROOMS HAVE BEEN FITTED IN MANY HOUSES IN THE LAST 20 YEARS. THERE IS A GOOD LOCAL BUS SERVICE FOR SHOPPING, BUT FREDDY GROWS HIS OWN FOOD.
